fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
As of March 2020, Synthetix is running a sUSD liquidity trial on Curve. The Foundation is contributing 32k SNX per week to those incentives, paid programmatically to liquidity providers in the Curve.fi sUSD/y.curve.fi pool.

Read the team's blog post announcing the trial [here](https://blog.synthetix.io/susd-liquidity-trial-with-curve-iearn/).

fields.title: For more details visit our help page:
